description:
TOP SELLING VITAMIN C SERUM WITH FREE $35 VALUE EYE TREATMENT BONUSOur product has been scientifically formulated to provideAMAZING RESULTS. While other brands offer just 18% Vitamin C or less, our serum contains20% Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.SPOILER ALERT!! - AVOID THIS ONE INGREDIENTThe general public has been misinformed. Vitamin C Serum that contains WATER as the main ingredient in its formulation makes the most important ingredient, the Vitamin C compound, not work. Water oxidizes Vitamin C, and making it ineffective, and potentially harmful to your face. IF YOU LOOK ON AMAZON YOU WILL NOTICE THAT MOST OF THE SELLERS WATER AS A MAIN INGREDIENT IN THEIR PRODUCT-THIS IS NOT WHAT YOU WANT!With any topical serum, the more potent the Vitamin C compound, the  the better it is. That's why Sano Naturals heat seals all of its Vitamin C Serums, ensuring minimal contact with oxygen.  We use an Organic Herbal Infusion, Hyaluronic Acid Organic Aloe (NOT REGULAR WATER).

Many sellers also use Alcohols (ie Propylene Glycol) and Added Fragrance in their Serums.  These ingredients irritate and dry out skin.  Sano Naturals Vitamin C Serum uses ONLY Naturally and Organically Derived Components that are best for your skin.BACKED BY SCIENCE- We have done all the research so you don't have to. Our formulation of:- 20% Vitamin C (most stable Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate)- Hyaluronic Acid- Organic AloeMeans a 100% Unmatched Skin Care Experience -backed by our No-hassle, Money-Back Guarantee.Try it now, click the order button above to start your skin care journey ABSOLUTELY RISK FREE!NOTE: Other imitation Vitamin C Serum do not have the same potency, and can be potentially dangerous to your skin.
title: Vitamin C Serum 20% with BONUS Vitamin C Eye Gel ($35 Value). Most Stable Vitamin C+ Hyaluronic Acid + Organic Aloe Resists Oxidation (MAKES OTHER SERUMS NOT WORK). Natural, Organic Collagen Boosting, Anti Aging, Anti Wrinkle, Skin Care. Best Value on Amazon. Proudly Made in USA
